recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Creamy Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Mix eggs and cheese. Cook pancetta. Combine all with pepper.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy stir fry with a variety of fresh vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables. Heat oil, add garlic and ginger. Add vegetables and soy sauce. Stir fry until cooked.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Classic Indian dish with spiced chicken in a creamy tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. Cook onions and garlic. Add tomato puree and chicken. Simmer.

recipes.name: Beef Chili
recipes.description: Hearty and spicy beef chili with beans and tomatoes.
recipes.instructions: Cook beef and onion. Add tomatoes, beans, and chili powder. Simmer.

recipes.name: Sushi Platter
recipes.description: Assorted sushi featuring fresh fish and vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Prepare sushi rice. Slice fish and vegetables. Roll sushi with nori and fillings.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy risotto with wild mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
recipes.instructions: Saute mushrooms and onions. Add rice. Gradually stir in broth until absorbed. Mix in Parmesan.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
recipes.description: Warm and comforting tomato soup with a touch of basil.
recipes.instructions: Cook onion and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer. Blend until smooth. Garnish with basil.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad Final
recipes.description: Classic Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing.
